com.comphenix.xp.parser

Class TextParser<TResult>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.xp.parser.TextParser<TResult>
  • Type Parameters:
    TResult - - type of the resulting object.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanParser, IntegerParser, ItemDurabilityParser, ItemNameParser, ItemParser, MobDamageCauseParser, MobEntityTypeParser, MobMatcher, MobParser, MobSizeParser, ParameterParser, PotionParser, PotionTypeParser, PresetParser, StringParser

    public abstract class TextParser<TResult>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an object that transforms strings of text into objects.
    Author:
    Kristian

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public abstract TResult parse(java.lang.String text)
                       throws ParsingException
        Transforms the given text into an object.
        Parameters:
        text - - text to parse.
        Returns:
        Result of the parsing.
        Throws:
        ParsingException - The text cannot be transformed into a list of objects.

      • parse

        public TResult parse(java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> tokens)
              throws ParsingException
        Transforms the head of the queue into a string of objects. No head is treated as an empty string.
        Parameters:
        tokens - - queue of tokens.
        Returns:
        The corresponding string of objects.
        Throws:
        ParsingException - The head cannot be transformed into a list of objects.

      • getParameterQueue

        protected java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> getParameterQueue(java.lang.String text)
        Reads tokens from (delimited by a vertical bar) a query rule body.
        Parameters:
        text - - query rule body to read.
        Returns:
        Queue of the tokens.

      • tryParse

        public static java.lang.Integer tryParse(java.lang.String input)
        Attempt to parse integer.
        Parameters:
        input - - text of the integer to parse.
        Returns:
        The parsed integer if successful, or NULL if unsuccessful.

      • tryParse

        public static java.lang.Integer tryParse(java.lang.String input,
                         java.lang.Integer defaultValue)
        Attempt to parse integer.
        Parameters:
        input - - text of the integer to parse.
        defaultValue - - value to return if the parsing was unsuccessful.
        Returns:
        The parsed integer if successful, or defaultValue if not.
